translation.en: [lip-synching] ♪ Well, he walked up to me And he asked me if I wanted to dance ♪
translation.zh: 他向我走来 邀我共舞

translation.en: ♪ He looked kinda nice And so I said I might take a chance ♪
translation.zh: 他看起来好帅 我就想或许我可以尝试一下

translation.en: ♪ I didn't know just what to do ♪
translation.zh: 我不知道该怎么办

translation.en: ♪ So I whispered, "I love you" ♪
translation.zh: 所以我小声说“我爱你”

translation.en: ♪ He said that he loved me too And then he kissed me ♪
translation.zh: 他说他也爱我 然后亲吻了我

translation.en: ♪ Then he asked me to be his bride ♪
translation.zh: 然后他让我当他的新娘

translation.en: ♪ And always be right by his side ♪
translation.zh: 让我永远在他身边

translation.en: ♪ I felt so happy I almost cried And then he kissed me ♪
translation.zh: 我几乎要兴奋地落泪 然后他亲吻了我

translation.en: Adventures in Babysitting?
translation.zh: 《翘家的一夜》？

translation.en: Seriously, Lara Jean?
translation.zh: 不是吧 拉拉简？

translation.en: Now is not the time to be fantasizing about living in an '80s movie.
translation.zh: 现在不是幻想自己生活在 20世纪80年代电影里的时候

translation.en: Except for today, it's different because it's not a fantasy.
translation.zh: 除了今天 今天不一样 因为它不是幻想

translation.en: This is my real life.
translation.zh: 而是真实的

translation.en: Don't I look different to you?
translation.zh: 我看起来有什么变化吗？

translation.en: Um...
translation.zh: 这…

translation.en: No.
translation.zh: 没有

translation.en: Yeah, I don't see it.
translation.zh: 好吧 我没看出来

translation.en: How?
translation.zh: 怎么个不同法？

translation.en: Like someone that has a boyfriend would look.
translation.zh: 就是有了男朋友的人看起来的样子

translation.en: You look like he's gonna be here soon and you haven't started getting ready.
translation.zh: 你看起来像是他马上就要来了 而你一点都没准备的样子

translation.en: Have you even showered?
translation.zh: 你都还没洗澡吗？

translation.en: Get out.
translation.zh: 出去

translation.en: [sniffs] I'm gonna take a shower.
translation.zh: 我得洗个澡了

translation.en: [Lara Jean] People say fairy tales aren't real.
translation.zh: 人们都说童话不是真的

translation.en: -But sometimes... -[doorbell rings]
translation.zh: 但有时候…

translation.en: ...happily ever after is for real.
translation.zh: 永远幸福也不是没有可能

translation.en: I've been thinking about this moment since I started reading romance novels.
translation.zh: 从我开始读言情小说起 就一直在期盼这一刻

translation.en: My very first date.
translation.zh: 我人生的第一次约会

translation.en: How do I look?
translation.zh: 我看起来怎么样？

translation.en: Perfect.
translation.zh: 完美

translation.en: You look fantastic, honey.
translation.zh: 你看起来非常美 亲爱的

translation.en: Okay.
translation.zh: 好的

translation.en: Hi.
translation.zh: 嗨

translation.en: Hey.
translation.zh: 嗨

translation.en: What's up?
translation.zh: 你怎么样？

translation.en: -Nothing much. -No?
translation.zh: -还好 -是吗？

translation.en: Got you something.
translation.zh: 我给你带了礼物

translation.en: -Oh, thank you. -Oh, hey, Kitty.
translation.zh: -谢谢 -嗨 基蒂

translation.en: This is for you. Gerbera daisies are my favorite.
translation.zh: -这是送你的 -非洲雏菊是我的最爱

translation.en: What restaurant did you pick? 'Cause I know some of the best.
translation.zh: -科维医生 -你选了哪家餐厅？ 因为我知道一些不错的餐厅

translation.en: Okay, Dad... here. Put these in water. Go.
translation.zh: 爸爸？给 把花放水里 快去

translation.en: Say it out loud. Eleven o'clock?
translation.zh: 大声说出来 11点？

translation.en: Eleven o'clock.
Okay, have fun.
translation.zh: 好的 祝你们玩得开心

translation.en: Not too much fun.
translation.zh: 但也别太开心

translation.en: Bye.
translation.zh: 再见

translation.en: My gosh, I've never been to Cardona's.
translation.zh: 我的天 我从未来过卡多纳餐厅

translation.en: [Peter chuckles] It's a good place.
translation.zh: 这里很不错

translation.en: -[Lara Jean] I'm so excited. -Yeah?
translation.zh: -我好开心 -是吗？

translation.en: -[Lara Jean] This is good. Yeah! -[laughing] I think you're gonna like it.
translation.zh: 这里真好 是的！ -我就知道你会喜欢这里 -我的天 这里真美

translation.en: -[Lara Jean] It's so beautiful. -Mm-hmm.
translation.zh: -我就知道你会喜欢这里 -我的天 这里真美

translation.en: -For the signorina. -Thank you.
translation.zh: -小姐 -谢谢

translation.en: -And the signor. -Grazie.
translation.zh: -先生 -谢谢

translation.en: Wow, they have big menus here.
translation.zh: 天啊 他们的菜单好长

translation.en: The bigger the menu, the fancier the restaurant. Everybody knows that.
translation.zh: 菜单越长 餐厅越高档 这道理谁都懂

translation.en: It's actually a two-fork restaurant.
translation.zh: 这家餐厅其实常备两把叉子

translation.en: They give you the second one just in case you knock the first one off the table.
translation.zh: 他们会多放一把 以防你不小心把第一把叉子掉地上了

translation.en: No, that's not... that's not it.
translation.zh: 不 不是的

translation.en: -That's what it is. -No, it's not.
translation.zh: -就是这样 -不 不是的

translation.en: Watch. You ready?
translation.zh: -看好了 准备好了吗？ -别这样

translation.en: -Peter, stop. That's so embarrassing. -[Peter] Oh, my God. What's happening?
translation.zh: 彼得 别这样 这也太丢人了 -怎么回事？ -为什么…

translation.en: -[fork clattering] -Peter.
translation.zh: 彼得

translation.en: It's a good thing I have my backup.
translation.zh: 好在还有一个备用的

translation.en: This is my first date.
translation.zh: 这是我人生第一次约会

translation.en: I've never been a girlfriend before.
translation.zh: 我从未当过别人的女朋友

translation.en: I hope I'm good at it.
translation.zh: 希望我很擅长这种事

translation.en: -Hey. -Hmm? Give me your keys.
translation.zh: 把车钥匙给我

translation.en: Oh, you really wanna drive?
translation.zh: 不 你真要开车吗？

translation.en: I'm a good driver now!
translation.zh: 我现在开车技术很好的！

translation.en: I have a fear of driving in the snow, but guess what?
translation.zh: 我害怕下雪的时候开车 但你猜怎么着？

translation.en: [singsong] It's not snowing.
translation.zh: 现在没在下雪

translation.en: -Okay, fine. Just please don't kill us. -Yes!
translation.zh: -好吧 那就依你 千万别害死我们 -太好了！

translation.en: Please?
translation.zh: 拜托？

translation.en: [Peter] How did you know about this?
translation.zh: 你怎么会知道这件事？

translation.en: [Lara Jean] I have my ways.
translation.zh: 我有自己的办法

translation.en: -Okay, you write a wish... -[Peter] Mm-hmm. and then you send it into the sky.
translation.zh: 好的 你在上面写下心愿 然后把孔明灯放到天空中

translation.en: -That's not a wish. -What do you mean?
translation.zh: -那不是心愿 -什么意思？

translation.en: It's not a wish. It's happening right now, so it can't be a wish.
translation.zh: 那不是心愿 它已经变成现实了 所以不可能是心愿

translation.en: -What? -What?
translation.zh: -怎么了？ -怎么了？

translation.en: What's up?
translation.zh: 到底怎么了？

translation.en: I just don't want this to end.
translation.zh: 我只是不希望我们会分手

translation.en: You're thinking about us ending right now?
translation.zh: 你现在在想着我们分手的事？

translation.en: [laughs] It's just a thought that popped in my head, okay? Just...
translation.zh: 就是突然闪现在我脑子里的一个念头 好吗？就是…

translation.en: Well, tell that thought to get out of your head!
translation.zh: 那就快让那个念头离开你的脑子！

translation.en: You can't think about us breaking up on our first date.
translation.zh: 我们才第一次约会 你不能想分手这种事

translation.en: I just don't want us to break each other's hearts.
translation.zh: 我只希望我们不会让彼此伤心

translation.en: I promise I am not going to break your heart.
translation.zh: 我保证不会让你伤心

translation.en: I promise not to break your heart.
translation.zh: 我也保证不会让你伤心

translation.en: -Do you love it? -I do.
translation.zh: -你喜欢吗？ -喜欢

translation.en: -Look at that! That's awesome. -You have really great handwriting.
translation.zh: -看啊！太棒了 -你写字真好看

translation.en: We can do it.
translation.zh: 我们能做到的

translation.en: -[Peter] You got it. Yes! -Whoo!
translation.zh: 你可以的

translation.en: Let it fill up.
translation.zh: 让空气慢慢进去

translation.en: That's cool.
translation.zh: 太酷了

translation.en: -Oh, my gosh! -[Peter] There it goes.
translation.zh: -我的天！ -它飞上天了

translation.en: We did it. It's so beautiful.
translation.zh: 我们成功了 它真美

translation.en: -You can still see our initials. -Mm-hmm.
translation.zh: 现在所有人都能看到我们 名字的首字母了

translation.en: I don't think I'm ever going to get used to how deep your car is.
translation.zh: 我不知道自己以后能不能适应 你车子的高度

translation.en: -[Peter laughing] It's a bit... -It's so tall.
translation.zh: -它是辆…对 -它真的好高

translation.en: It is a pretty, pretty tall wagon.
translation.zh: 它是辆很漂亮 很高的马车

translation.en: When I get down, I feel like I'm falling.
translation.zh: 我每次下车都感觉自己要摔下来

translation.en: Then you should wait. I'll come around and catch you on the other side.
translation.zh: 那你应该等着 我会过来接住你

translation.en: -What? -So...
translation.zh: 所以…

translation.en: how was your first date?
translation.zh: 你第一次约会感觉如何？

translation.en: And tell me like it wasn't me who took you.
translation.zh: 说出你真实的想法 就当不是我问的

translation.en: It was...
translation.zh: 约会非常…

translation.en: perfect.
translation.zh: 完美

translation.en: -Yeah? -Mm-hmm.
translation.zh: -是吗？ -是

translation.en: Okay, good night.
translation.zh: 好的 晚安

translation.en: Okay. Good night.
translation.zh: 好 晚安

translation.en: Good night.
translation.zh: 晚安

translation.en: [Margot on phone] Flip the bigger part in your right hand over the smaller part in your left hand.
translation.zh: 把你右手里长的那端 压在左手短的那端上面

translation.en: Are you sure we have to dress up like this?
translation.zh: 你确定我们非得穿成这样吗？

translation.en: You know the other kids aren't going to.
translation.zh: 你知道其他孩子都不会这么穿的

translation.en: Okay, we're doing it, Kitty. It's what Dad wants.
translation.zh: 行了 我们必须穿 爸爸想让我们穿

translation.en: [Margot] Aw, you guys look amazing. I love Korean New Year.
translation.zh: 你们看起来真美 我好爱韩国新年

translation.en: I really wish I was there.
translation.zh: 真希望我在你们身边

translation.en: [Kitty] Yeah, we do, too.
translation.zh: 我们也是

translation.en: -I'm gonna send you a gazillion pictures. -[Dan] It's almost time!
translation.zh: -我会给你发很多照片的 -到时间了！

translation.en: We gotta go!
translation.zh: 我们得出发了！

translation.en: My girls.
translation.zh: 我的女儿

translation.en: Oh, no. Here it comes.
translation.zh: 不 又来了

translation.en: Like two beautiful little roses.
translation.zh: 就像两朵娇艳的玫瑰

translation.en: Is that Margot?
translation.zh: 你们在跟玛戈特视频吗？

translation.en: Honey, I wish you were here.
translation.zh: 亲爱的 我真希望你在这里

translation.en: I do, too.
translation.zh: 我也是

translation.en: -I love you guys. -Bye.
translation.zh: -爱你们 -再见

translation.en: I did it.
translation.zh: 我做到了

translation.en: Yeah, I didn't think you could.
translation.zh: 是啊 我都不知道你会成功

translation.en: Good morning. You guys look great.
translation.zh: 早上好 你们俩真漂亮

translation.en: -Thanks! -Here you go, Doc.
translation.zh: -谢谢 -给你 医生

translation.en: Thanks, Jasmine.
translation.zh: 谢谢你 杰斯敏

translation.en: Now, don't you feel left out you didn't wear your hanbok?
translation.zh: 你没穿韩服 不觉得自己被忽略了吗？

translation.en: [flatly] Yes, Mom. Beyond devastated.
translation.zh: 是啊 妈 我现在超级崩溃

translation.en: Thank you.
translation.zh: 谢谢

translation.en: -[man] Want a beer, Dan? -[Dan] Yeah, why not?
translation.zh: -喝啤酒吗 爸？ -好啊 有何不可？

translation.en: [Carrie] So, Dan, are you dating anyone?
translation.zh: 丹 你有在跟人约会吗？

translation.en: -[Grandma] Carrie! -[Carrie] It's just a question!
translation.zh: -嘉丽！ -我就是问问嘛！

translation.en: That doesn't mean you have to stay single forever.
translation.zh: 但这并不意味着你要一辈子单身

translation.en: [Lara Jean] My dad says it's important for us to keep our Korean heritage alive.
translation.zh: 我爸爸说很有必要传承 我们的朝鲜传统

translation.en: But I know the real reason we make such a big effort on the holidays
translation.zh: 但我知道我们之所以 在节日的时候这么大费周章

translation.en: is because being around her family makes him feel closer to my mom.
translation.zh: 是因为跟她的家人在一起 会让他觉得跟我妈妈很亲近

translation.en: So you have a boyfriend?
translation.zh: 你有男朋友了？

translation.en: No offense or anything,
translation.zh: 这话你别往心里去

translation.en: but I always thought you were a "no dating till college" type girl.
translation.zh: 但我一直以为你是那种 会在上大学后才交男朋友的女生

translation.en: His name is Peter, and he wouldn't be dating Lara Jean if it wasn't for me,
translation.zh: 他叫彼得 要不是多亏我 他根本不会跟拉拉简约会 因为他根本就不知道她的存在

translation.en: 'cause he didn't even know she existed,
translation.zh: 他根本不会跟拉拉简约会 因为他根本就不知道她的存在

translation.en: but I mailed a secret love letter that she wrote for him--
translation.zh: 但我帮她寄出了一封 她写给他的秘密情书

translation.en: Well, technically, she wrote five.
translation.zh: 严格来说 她写了五封

translation.en: Anyway, they started fake dating to make his ex-girlfriend jealous,
translation.zh: 总之 他们开始假装约会 好让他前女友吃醋

translation.en: and to cover up her real crush,
translation.zh: 也为了掩饰她对他真正的喜欢

translation.en: but everything got weird and they started real dating,
translation.zh: 但后来一切变得奇怪 他们开始真正地约会

translation.en: and now they're real boyfriend and real girlfriend and they are adorable.
translation.zh: 现在他们是真正的恋人关系 而且他们超级可爱

translation.en: Cute story.
translation.zh: 这故事真不错

translation.en: A little PG-13, but cute.
translation.zh: 有点像13岁小孩做的事 但很可爱

translation.en: Show Haven a picture of him.
translation.zh: 给赫文看看他的照片

translation.en: Shut up. This is your boyfriend?
translation.zh: 闭嘴 他就是你男朋友吗？

translation.en: Yeah, why?
translation.zh: 对 怎么了？

translation.en: Dude, I hate to be the one to tell you this,
translation.zh: 伙计 这话我实在不想说

translation.en: but I saw a video of him and some girl doing it in a hot tub.
translation.zh: 但我看到过一段他跟某个女孩 在浴缸里做爱的视频

translation.en: Yeah, um... that was me.
translation.zh: 对 那女孩就是我

translation.en: But it's not what you think. We were just making out.
translation.zh: 但不是你想的那样 我们只是在亲热

translation.en: That's...
translation.zh: 其实…

translation.en: cool, actually.
translation.zh: 这还蛮酷的

translation.en: I want some ice cream. You want some?
translation.zh: 我要吃冰激凌 你们吃吗？

translation.en: -Sure. -Sure.
translation.zh: -吃 -吃

translation.en: [Dan] That's for you.
translation.zh: 你的信

translation.en: Thanks.
translation.zh: 谢谢

translation.en: When Kitty mailed my love letters, I thought my life was over.
translation.zh: 基蒂把我的情书寄出去之后 我以为自己这辈子都完了

translation.en: For weeks, I prayed John Ambrose's letter had gotten lost in the mail.
translation.zh: 我好几周都祈祷寄给 约翰安布罗斯的信被邮局弄丢了

translation.en: And when I never heard anything back, I thought the nightmare was over.
translation.zh: 我没有收到任何回复 还以为噩梦结束了

translation.en: But, I guess it wasn't.
translation.zh: 看来噩梦并没有结束

translation.en: [John Ambrose] Dear Lara Jean,
translation.zh: 亲爱的拉拉简

translation.en: I couldn't believe when I opened that letter and it was from you. [chuckles]
translation.zh: 我打开信后 发现是你寄来的 惊讶了好半天

translation.en: Wow. It's been, what, five years since we've seen each other?
translation.zh: 天啊 我们应该有五年没见面了吧？

translation.en: Not that I'm mad or anything. I was so happy to get it.
translation.zh: 我没有生气 我很高兴收到你的来信

translation.en: I can't believe how mature you were at 11.
translation.zh: 你11岁的时候就很成熟 我觉得你很了不起

translation.en: God, when I was 11, my mom was still putting out snacks for me after school,
translation.zh: 老天 我11岁的时候 我妈在我下学后还给我做零食呢

translation.en: but here you were with all these complex thoughts and emotions.
translation.zh: 但你当时已经有很多 复杂的想法和情绪了

translation.en: It's crazy.
translation.zh: 真的很不可思议

translation.en: Reading it reminded me of that time that we both got locked out after school.
translation.zh: 读信的时候让我想起 我们有次下学后不能回家的事

translation.en: -Remember that? -[wind chime jingling]
translation.zh: 你还记得吗？

translation.en: We went to the Robertson's treehouse and read Harry Potter until it got dark.
translation.zh: 我们去了罗伯森家的树屋 在那里读《哈利波特》 一直到天黑

translation.en: If I'd written you a love letter back then,
translation.zh: 如果当时的我给你写情书 我很确定

translation.en: I'm pretty sure it would've just said something like, um,
translation.zh: 自己不会写什么

translation.en: "I liked reading with you.
translation.zh: “我喜欢跟你一起读书

translation.en: You're really pretty."
translation.zh: 你真好看”这样的话

translation.en: But your letter was so much more than that.
translation.zh: 但你的信对我来说意义重大

translation.en: I just have one question: Why send it now?
translation.zh: 我只有一个问题： 为什么现在才给我寄信？

translation.en: Whatever the reason, I'm really glad I got to read it.
translation.zh: 不管原因是什么 我还是很开心你写了信来

translation.en: Yours, John Ambrose.
translation.zh: 此致 约翰安布罗斯

translation.en: [Lara Jean] Oh, my God.
translation.zh: 我的天

translation.en: John Ambrose McClaren just wrote me a letter.
translation.zh: 约翰安布罗斯麦克拉伦 给我写了一封信

translation.en: Wait, does this mean he liked me in sixth grade, too?
translation.zh: 等一下 这说明六年级的时候 他也喜欢我吗？

translation.en: Does he like me now?
translation.zh: 那他现在还喜欢我吗？

translation.en: Okay. Calm down.
translation.zh: 好了 冷静

translation.en: It's not a spontaneous love letter or anything.
translation.zh: 这不是一封一时冲动写下的情书

translation.en: It's more like a thank-you card.
translation.zh: 更像是一张感谢卡

translation.en: There's no need to respond.
translation.zh: 没必要回复他

translation.en: But... wouldn't it be rude not to respond?
translation.zh: 可是 要是不回复 是不是有点不礼貌？

translation.en: It would definitely be inconsiderate, so I respond.
translation.zh: 不回复肯定欠妥 所以我得回复

translation.en: But, in a friendly way. Just be, like, polite.
translation.zh: 但就像朋友之间的通信一样 就客气一下

translation.en: Thank him for his letter and move on.
translation.zh: 谢谢他回信 然后这件事翻篇

translation.en: Dear John Ambrose,
translation.zh: 亲爱的约翰安布罗斯

translation.en: I hope this letter finds you well.
translation.zh: 希望你一切都好

translation.en: Have you continued your interest in politics and diplomacy?
translation.zh: 你现在还对政治和外交感兴趣吗？

translation.en: I'm sure you're even more smart, considerate, and adorable--
translation.zh: 我肯定你现在 更聪明、体贴和可爱了…

translation.en: What am I saying?
translation.zh: 我在说什么？

translation.en: I can't say that.
translation.zh: 我不能那么说

translation.en: Dear John Ambrose,
translation.zh: 亲爱的约翰安布罗斯

translation.en: What lovely penmanship you have.
translation.zh: 你字写得真好

translation.en: When I saw your name on the envelope, my heart skipped a beat, and then I--
translation.zh: 我看到信封上你的名字时 心脏几乎停跳了一拍 然后我…

translation.en: [groans] I am so lame.
translation.zh: 我好逊

translation.en: Dear John Ambrose,
translation.zh: 亲爱的约翰安布罗斯

translation.en: First of all, thank you for writing me back.
translation.zh: 首先 感谢你给我回信

translation.en: It's nice to be in touch after so long.
translation.zh: 这么久之后 能再次跟你取得联系 真是太好了

translation.en: I do remember that day in the treehouse reading until it was dark.
translation.zh: 我确实还记得那天 我们在树屋里读书到天黑的事

translation.en: You said you were House Hufflepuff, and that was my house, too,
translation.zh: 你说你是赫奇帕奇学院的 我也是那个学院的

translation.en: and I thought maybe that was a sign that we were meant to be.
translation.zh: 我想 这或许是个暗示 我们注定要在一起

translation.en: Oh, my God.
translation.zh: 我的天

translation.en: I cannot do this.
translation.zh: 我不能这么做

translation.en: Do I have to tell Peter about this?
translation.zh: 这件事我用告诉彼得吗？

translation.en: [woman on PA] All juniors, please report to the cafeteria to choose your spring service commitments.
translation.zh: 所有高三学生请前往餐厅 选择春季服务项目

translation.en: [chuckling] 'Sup, Covey?
translation.zh: 你好 科维

translation.en: -Ready? -Always.
translation.zh: -准备好了吗？ -一向如此

translation.en: -What is going on in that head of yours? -What do you mean?
translation.zh: -你有什么心事？ -什么意思？

translation.en: Uh, snickerdoodles. They're your pensive bake.
translation.zh: 肉桂饼干 你有心事时 都会做这种饼干

translation.en: -How do you know that? -I dunno. Maybe from...
translation.zh: -你怎么知道？ -我说不好 或许是从…

translation.en: that picture you posted on Instagram a few months ago, #pensivebake?
translation.zh: 你几个月前在照片墙上发布的那张 标签为心事饼干的照片上知道的？

translation.en: [laughs] Oh, yeah. That's when I didn't know what was going on between us.
translation.zh: 是啊 那次是因为 我不知道我们之间是怎么回事

translation.en: That's not what's going on now, I hope.
translation.zh: 希望这次不是因为这种事

translation.en: Do you remember when Kitty sent out my love letters?
translation.zh: 你还记得基蒂 把我的情书寄出去的事吗？

translation.en: Is that a serious question?
translation.zh: 这是个认真的问题吗？

translation.en: [chuckles] No, of course you remember. But...
translation.zh: 不 你当然记得 但是

translation.en: remember when you asked me who got the other ones,
translation.zh: 你还记得你问我 都有谁收到了那些信

translation.en: and I said the last one went to someone from Model UN?
translation.zh: 我说最后一封寄给了一个 进入了模拟联合国的男孩吗？

translation.en: Mm-hmm.
translation.zh: 记得

translation.en: -It was John Ambrose McClaren. -No shit.
translation.zh: -那人是约翰安布罗斯麦克拉伦 -不是吧

translation.en: McClaren? That was my boy.
translation.zh: 麦克拉伦？他曾是我的好朋友

translation.en: Well, he wrote me back.
translation.zh: 他给我回信了

translation.en: He wrote you-- Like, an actual... Like, an actual letter? Or an email? Or...
translation.zh: 他真的给你写了…一封信吗？ 还是写了电子邮件？还是…

translation.en: Yeah, like a real letter in the mail.
translation.zh: 对 那种邮寄过来的信件

translation.en: Huh.
translation.zh: 这样啊

translation.en: He say anything about me?
translation.zh: 他有提到我吗？

translation.en: -Like what? -I dunno.
translation.zh: -提到你什么？ -我不知道

translation.en: Like, "Um, how's Kavinsky? How's he doing?"
translation.zh: 比如说“凯文斯基怎么样？ 他还好吗？”

translation.en: [chuckling] Nope.
translation.zh: 没有

translation.en: Did you write him back?
translation.zh: 那你有给他回信吗？

translation.en: Not yet.
translation.zh: 还没有

translation.en: Oh, so you're, like... you're, like, going to, planning on it?
translation.zh: 所以你打算给他回信喽？

translation.en: I probably should.
translation.zh: 或许会

translation.en: -Why? -Because it'd be rude not to.
translation.zh: -为什么？ -因为不回信的话显得很没礼貌

translation.en: Then, I don't know why you're telling me all this.
translation.zh: 那我就不明白你为何 告诉我这件事了

translation.en: Are you asking for my permission or...
translation.zh: 你是在征得我的允许还是…

translation.en: No, I just thought it was gonna be strange if I didn't tell you.
translation.zh: 不 我就是觉得如果不告诉你的话 会比较奇怪

translation.en: Please choose your service commitments wisely.
translation.zh: 请大家谨慎选择服务项目

translation.en: You will be representing Adler at your chosen post.
translation.zh: 你们在所选的岗位上 代表的可是艾德勒高中

translation.en: Expand your horizons, people! Thank you.
translation.zh: 大家把眼界放宽一点！谢谢

translation.en: [Trevor] Yo! K, what's up, big boy?
translation.zh: 嗨！ 你好啊 帅小伙

translation.en: -'Sup, LJ? -Hi, Trevor.
translation.zh: -你好 拉拉简 -你好 特雷弗

translation.en: Yo, bro, so check it out.
translation.zh: 兄弟 听好了

translation.en: We already snagged six spots at Oakwood Market.
translation.zh: 我们已经拿下了 奥克伍德超市的六个岗位

translation.en: Everybody's in, done deal.
translation.zh: -大家都报名 然后一切万事大吉 -走吧

translation.en: Come on. Covey, let us sign you up.
translation.zh: 科维 我们带你去报名

translation.en: -Oakwood? -Yes.
translation.zh: -奥克伍德？ -对

translation.en: I kinda thought we'd volunteer at Belleview together.
translation.zh: 我还以为我们会一起去 贝尔维尤当志愿者

translation.en: Okay, I'm out. Uh, enjoy your fight.
translation.zh: 好吧 我不管了 你们自己定吧

translation.en: Come on, let me sign you up. It'll be fun.
translation.zh: 走吧 我们去报名 会很好玩的

translation.en: [sighing] Margot volunteered at Belleview.
translation.zh: 玛戈特曾在贝尔维尤当志愿者

translation.en: And, besides, Belleview looks better on college applications.
translation.zh: 而且 申请大学的时候 贝尔维尤能让我有点优势

translation.en: I dunno, it was just the guys-- We kind of decided that
translation.zh: 我说不好 就是我那些朋友… 我们算是说好了

translation.en: we were gonna do Oakwood when training started. But, um...
translation.zh: 等训练开始后 我们要一起去奥克伍德

translation.en: You should go. I'm gonna sign up for Belleview.
translation.zh: 那你去吧 我去贝尔维尤那里报名

translation.en: -Are you sure -Mm-hmm.
translation.zh: 你确定吗？ 确定

translation.en: Go sign up. Seriously.
translation.zh: 去报名吧 真的

translation.en: Okay, well, let me make it up to you.
translation.zh: 好吧 我会补偿你的

translation.en: Let's meet after practice for coffee.
translation.zh: 等我训练结束后 我们一起喝咖啡

translation.en: Five o'clock.
translation.zh: 5点钟

translation.en: Sounds good.
translation.zh: 这主意不错

translation.en: -It's epic. -You're so lazy! It's epic.
translation.zh: -这主意真的很厉害 -你真懒！

translation.en: Come on, you guys. Come sign up for Belleview with me.
translation.zh: 好了 你们俩 我们一起去贝尔维尤那里报名吧

translation.en: Playing Connect 4 with a bunch of octagenarians? No, thanks.
translation.zh: 跟一群80多岁的老人玩四子棋？ 不了 谢谢

translation.en: Oh, hell nah.
translation.zh: 我才不要去那里

translation.en: Nah, I already signed up for the soup kitchen.
translation.zh: 不 我已经在汤厨房那里报名了

translation.en: Oh, I wrote a proposal for a new program.
translation.zh: 我写了一份新项目提议

translation.en: Rescue Animal Welfare.
translation.zh: 搜救动物福利

translation.en: Chris, this is you hanging out with your dog at home.
translation.zh: 克里斯 这明明就是在家 跟你的狗狗玩

translation.en: Yeah, a dog who's a rescue.
translation.zh: 是啊 它是一条搜救犬

translation.en: [chuckling] It's genius, right?
translation.zh: 这主意太妙了 对吧？

translation.en: No, that is genius. I'm with you on this one, Chris.
translation.zh: 对 是很妙 这件事上我挺你 克里斯

translation.en: [Gen] Of course you would do Belleview.
translation.zh: 你当然会申请贝尔维尤

translation.en: You're so predictable, Lara Jean. It's quite adorable.
translation.zh: 拉拉简 你真是太好猜了 真好玩

translation.en: -I guess you're doing Oakwood. -Sorting through half-rotten produce?
translation.zh: -我猜你在奥克伍德那里报了名 -归类半腐烂的农产品？

translation.en: No, thank you.
translation.zh: 还是算了 谢谢

translation.en: So, I saw on your story that you went to Cardona's this weekend?
translation.zh: 我看到你在社交媒体上的照片了 你这周末去了卡多纳餐厅？

translation.en: Classic Kavinsky.
translation.zh: 凯文斯基典型的泡妹方式

translation.en: You know, by the time we broke up, I actually thought I was gonna die
translation.zh: 其实 我们分手时 我还以为自己会死掉

translation.en: if I had any more cacio e pepe.
translation.zh: 如果我吃了更多芝士胡椒意大利面

translation.en: Pro tip: If you do want to fit into your jeans come summer,
translation.zh: 给你一条专业建议：如果你想在 明年夏天还能穿上之前的牛仔裤

translation.en: you should probably start ordering salad.
translation.zh: 或许你点菜时应该点沙拉了

translation.en: [Lara Jean] When Peter and I got together,
translation.zh: 我和彼得在一起时

translation.en: I didn't expect to feel so insecure about his past relationship with Gen.
translation.zh: 我从未想到自己会因为他之前 跟吉的恋情而有不安全感

translation.en: But for every first I was having with him,
translation.zh: 但我跟他所有的第一次

translation.en: he'd already had his with her.
translation.zh: 他都已经…跟她体验过了

translation.en: [girl] Sorry, are you using this chair?
translation.zh: 抱歉 这把椅子你用吗？

translation.en: Yeah. It's for my boyfriend. I'm sorry.
translation.zh: 用 这是留给我男朋友的 抱歉

translation.en: You don't need this chair, do you, Lara Jean?
translation.zh: 拉拉简 你不用这把椅子吧？

translation.en: I do.
translation.zh: 我用

translation.en: Peter's on his way.
translation.zh: 彼得马上就到

translation.en: -He's just running a little behind. -Is he?
translation.zh: -他稍微晚来一会儿 -是吗？

translation.en: -Is anybody using this chair? -Yes. My boyfriend, he's coming.
translation.zh: -有人用这把椅子吗？ -对 我男朋友 他马上过来

translation.en: Okay, I am so sorry, Covey. I--
translation.zh: 好吧 真的很抱歉 科维 我…

translation.en: Coach made us run the bleachers until everyone practically puked.
translation.zh: 教练让我们绕着露台跑 直到所有人都跑吐了

translation.en: Well, you could've let me know.
translation.zh: 你可以跟我说一声的

translation.en: [stammering] I would've, but he has that rule.
translation.zh: 我也很想 但他有规矩

translation.en: No texting during practice or else you don't start.
translation.zh: 训练期间不准发短信 否则就不能进入首发阵容

translation.en: I need to play every single game, so it's kind of...
translation.zh: 每场比赛我都得上 所以这有点…

translation.en: I'm really sorry.
translation.zh: 真的很抱歉

translation.en: I should've came up with a better plan that didn't leave you hanging.
translation.zh: 我该想出个更好的办法 不让你在这里一直干等的

translation.en: Yeah, you should've.
translation.zh: 对 你是该怎么做

translation.en: Let's get out of here.
translation.zh: 我们走吧

translation.en: What?
translation.zh: 什么？

translation.en: -Call your dad. -What?
translation.zh: -给你爸打个电话 -什么？

translation.en: Tell him you're gonna be home late.
translation.zh: 告诉他你会晚回家

translation.en: What? Where are we going?
translation.zh: 什么？我们去哪？

translation.en: I'm taking you out.
translation.zh: 我带你出去

translation.en: -Okay. Ah! -Yup. Let's go.
translation.zh: -好吧 -好 我们走

translation.en: -[Peter] Right now. -Okay, okay, I'm going.
translation.zh: -现在就走 -好吧 我跟你走

translation.en: You don't have to lift a finger.
translation.zh: 你连根手指头都不用动

translation.en: [Peter] Thank you so much, man.
translation.zh: -太谢谢你了 伙计 -谢谢

translation.en: -Ready? -I am.
translation.zh: -准备好了吗？ -好了

translation.en: -Yeah? -Come on, let's go!
translation.zh: -是吗？ -走啊 我们走！

translation.en: Come on.
translation.zh: 快

translation.en: We are here together at Sizzler.
translation.zh: 我们一起玩急速转轮

translation.en: -Whoo! -Here we go!
translation.zh: 开始了！

translation.en: -This is your idea! -I know!
translation.zh: -这可是你的主意！ -我知道！

translation.en: I love this date.
translation.zh: 我超爱这次约会

translation.en: -All right, what do you want to do next? -Bumper cars!
translation.zh: -好了 接下来你想玩哪个？ -碰碰车！

translation.en: [Peter] I got this. I got it! Come on.
translation.zh: 我可以的 加油！我可以的！

translation.en: Come on. Go, go, go, go, go!
translation.zh: 拜托 加油！

translation.en: -Stop it. Go! -[Peter] Come on!
translation.zh: -加油！ -快啊！

translation.en: -Stop, don't. Ow, Peter! -Stop, stop!
translation.zh: -停下 别那样 哎呀 彼得！ -快停下！

translation.en: [laughing]
translation.zh: 我是认真的 停下

translation.en: -Go, go! -No, no!
translation.zh: -加油！ -不要！

translation.en: -[bell rings] -Yeah!
translation.zh: 耶！

translation.en: Victory is mine!
translation.zh: 胜利属于我！

translation.en: I win!
translation.zh: 我赢了！

translation.en: -Well done. -Um, excuse me, miss?
translation.zh: -干得漂亮 -你好 女士

translation.en: Could I get this, please?
translation.zh: 能给我这个吗？

translation.en: Thank you.
translation.zh: 谢谢

translation.en: -Please watch. -Okay.
translation.zh: -看好了 -好的

translation.en: -I'm watching. -Okay.
translation.zh: -我看着呢 -好的

translation.en: [Lara Jean] It's a funny thing, this relationship stuff.
translation.zh: 谈恋爱这种事真的很奇怪

translation.en: One moment, things are upside down,
translation.zh: 在某一刻 一切都是灰暗的

translation.en: but then, like magic, there's glitter everywhere.
translation.zh: 然后突然像有人施了魔法一般 一切开始闪闪发光

translation.en: And once it all settles, you're right back in the fairy tale again.
translation.zh: 一旦所有问题解决 你就又回到童话故事里了

translation.en: [Kitty] Outdoorsy, morning person,
translation.zh: 喜欢出门 起床很早

translation.en: -consistently has good shoe choices. -What are you talking about?
translation.zh: -每次选鞋都很有眼光 -你在说什么？

translation.en: Mrs. Rothschild. I think they should date.
translation.zh: 罗斯柴尔德夫人 我觉得他们应该约会

translation.en: She's divorced, you know.
translation.zh: 她离婚了

translation.en: Happened last year.
translation.zh: 去年离的

translation.en: Right. Because Dad, who hasn't dated in years,
translation.zh: 是啊 因为好多年已经没有跟 别人约过会的爸爸

translation.en: is suddenly gonna start dating our neighbor.
translation.zh: 突然开始跟我们的邻居约会了

translation.en: Sounds a bit delusional, Kitty.
translation.zh: 基蒂 这就是你的幻想吧

translation.en: You also thought I was delusional when I suggested you date Peter.
translation.zh: 我建议你跟彼得约会时 你也说我是在幻想

translation.en: And, um, how did that one work out?
translation.zh: 结果怎么样？

translation.en: They just need a little shove.
translation.zh: 他们只需要别人推一把

translation.en: Kitty.
translation.zh: 基蒂

translation.en: Leave Dad and Mrs. Rothschild alone.
translation.zh: 别管爸爸和罗斯柴尔德夫人的事

translation.en: Okay? I mean it.
translation.zh: 好吗？我是认真的

translation.en: She cut down her hedges, Lara Jean. That is a metaphor!
translation.zh: 拉拉简 她砍掉了自己家的树篱 这是一个暗喻！

translation.en: Are you sure? I can just keep Henry outside.
translation.zh: 你确定吗？我可以让亨利在外面等着

translation.en: Can I get him anything? A rack of ribs?
translation.zh: 用我给它拿点什么吗？ 来点肋排如何？

translation.en: [laughs] Yes.
translation.zh: 好啊

translation.en: -[Dan] I'll get that number. -Good boy.
translation.zh: -我去拿电话号码 -好孩子

translation.en: Hi.
translation.zh: 嗨

translation.en: -Oh, hi. -Hi.
translation.zh: -嗨 -嗨

translation.en: [Lara Jean] Nice to see you, Mrs. Rothschild.
translation.zh: 很高兴见到你 罗斯柴尔德夫人

translation.en: Okay. I got Bobby's contact info. Can I text it?
translation.zh: 好了 我找到鲍比的联系方式了 用我发短信给你吗？

translation.en: [Trina] Yeah, know what? Why don't I just put my number in your phone?
translation.zh: 好啊 不如这样吧 我直接把我的号码存进你手机里？

translation.en: -[Dan] Oh, okay. -[Trina] Okay.
translation.zh: -好的 -好的

translation.en: This guy has got a master green thumb.
translation.zh: 这家伙对园艺很在行

translation.en: -He, uh, gave me some tips on hollyhocks. -Hollyhocks are my favorite.
translation.zh: -他给了我一些关于种植蜀葵的建议 -蜀葵是我的最爱

translation.en: -Really? -Yeah.
translation.zh: -是吗？ -是的

translation.en: [Dan] I find them more rewarding than boring azaleas.
translation.zh: 我感觉种蜀葵 比种无聊的杜鹃更有成就感

translation.en: [Trina giggling] Exactly.
translation.zh: 没错

translation.en: All right. I should probably go.
translation.zh: 好了 我该走了

translation.en: It's nice to see you, Mrs. Rothschild.
translation.zh: 很高兴见到你 罗斯柴尔德夫人

translation.en: Oh, Trina. Please.
translation.zh: 叫我特瑞娜就好

translation.en: -[Dan clears throat] -Trina.
translation.zh: 特瑞娜

translation.en: -Come on. Come on! -Well, I'll walk you out.
translation.zh: -我们走吧 -我送你出去

translation.en: Ah... okay.
translation.zh: 好

translation.en: They're gonna be in love by Valentine's Day!
translation.zh: 等到了情人节 他们肯定就会坠入爱河！

translation.en: How could you possibly get that from a conversation about gardening?
translation.zh: 他们不过是谈了谈园艺的事 你怎么就得出了这个结论？

translation.en: Because Dad is not a dog person. Hmm?
translation.zh: 因为爸爸根本不喜欢狗

translation.en: [woman] Don't let me make you nervous.
translation.zh: 先生 你别因为我而紧张

translation.en: [Lara Jean] Margot loved Belleview because of the people,
translation.zh: 玛戈特之所以喜欢贝尔维尤 是因为这里的人

translation.en: but there was one person she talked about way more than any of the others.
translation.zh: 但她尤其爱提起某个人

translation.en: [man] Hard to beat that!
translation.zh: 这可很难超越！

translation.en: For most people.
translation.zh: 对大多数而言

translation.en: Why that's a Song-Covey if I've ever seen one.
translation.zh: 又是一个宋和科维家的孩子

translation.en: You must be Stormy.
translation.zh: 你一定就是斯托米了

translation.en: And you must be Lara Jean.
translation.zh: 你一定是拉拉简了

translation.en: Did your sister send you over here to check up on me?
translation.zh: 你姐姐派你过来看我的吗？

translation.en: I'm volunteering. Do you know where to find Dorothy?
translation.zh: 我是这里的志愿者 你知道我能在哪找到多萝西吗？

translation.en: How is Margot enjoying Scotland?
translation.zh: 玛戈特在苏格兰过得如何？

translation.en: I think she really likes St. Andrews.
translation.zh: 我觉得她很喜欢圣安德鲁斯大学

translation.en: Well, I hope she's not just studying over there.
translation.zh: 希望她在那里不只是埋头苦读

translation.en: I never had a bad time in Scotland.
translation.zh: 我在苏格兰时就没有不开心过

translation.en: That was one of my routes for Pan Am.
translation.zh: 我在泛美航空公司时飞过那条线

translation.en: Were you a flight attendant?
translation.zh: 你之前是空乘人员吗？

translation.en: A flight attendant?
translation.zh: 空乘人员？

translation.en: That is some PC nonsense.
translation.zh: 这个破词就是为了政治正确

translation.en: I was a Pan Am stewardess.
translation.zh: 我曾是泛美航空的空姐

translation.en: We served smoked oysters and caviar and shook gin martinis at 30,000 feet.
translation.zh: 我们曾在9000多米的高空上向客人 提供熏牡蛎、鱼子酱 调制金马提尼

translation.en: We were the showgirls of the skies.
translation.zh: 我们是天上的表演女郎

translation.en: Come on, I'll give you a tour.
translation.zh: 走吧 我带你四处转转

translation.en: Oh, no, I think I actually have to wait for, uh, Dorothy--
translation.zh: 不用了 我得等多萝西

translation.en: The only thing Dorothy will tell you
translation.zh: 多萝西只会告诉你

translation.en: is where to find the first aid kit and the bingo supplies.
translation.zh: 在哪里能找到急救包 和宾果游戏卡

translation.en: If you'd like a real introduction to this place,
translation.zh: 如果你想真正熟悉这个地方

translation.en: follow me.
translation.zh: 那就跟我来

translation.en: Okay, I'm coming!
translation.zh: 好的 我这就来！

translation.en: This is the crafts room.
translation.zh: 这里是手工艺室

translation.en: And the knitting club.
translation.zh: 针织小组也在这里

translation.en: Why you would form a club to do an activity you can do alone is beyond me.
translation.zh: 为什么自己一个人单独就能做的事 偏偏要组个小组一起做 真是搞不懂

translation.en: The games room.
translation.zh: 这里是棋牌室

translation.en: Sore losers, they won't even let me play with them anymore.
translation.zh: 一群输不起的家伙 他们都不让我跟他们一起玩了

translation.en: Bunch of communists.
translation.zh: 一群共产主义者

translation.en: Communists?
translation.zh: 共产主义者？

translation.en: This used to be the breakfast room until Hilda over there decided she had a gift.
translation.zh: 这里原本是早餐餐厅 直到那边的希尔达觉得自己拥有天赋

translation.en: We can hear you, you know?
translation.zh: 你知道我们能听到你的吧？

translation.en: But, didn't you know what we were going to say anyway?
translation.zh: 可是你早就知道我们会说什么吧？

translation.en: Ah, here's Dorothy.
translation.zh: 多萝西在这里

translation.en: This is my very dear friend Lara Jean.
translation.zh: 这是我非常亲爱的朋友拉拉简

translation.en: She's one of our high school volunteers.
translation.zh: 她是从高中来的一个志愿者

translation.en: -Hello. -Hi.
translation.zh: -你好 -嗨

translation.en: Now, Dorothy,
translation.zh: 听好了 多萝西

translation.en: this one is very special.
translation.zh: 她可是很特别的

translation.en: So, I want you to apply the same care to her
translation.zh: 所以我希望你像调制 自己完美的血腥玛丽一样

translation.en: as you do to your excellent Bloody Mary mix.
translation.zh: 好好照顾她

translation.en: [chuckling] You make me laugh.
translation.zh: 你真搞笑

translation.en: Knock 'em dead, honey.
translation.zh: 亲爱的 搞定他们

translation.en: Thank you.
translation.zh: 谢谢

translation.en: -Getting a refill. -Make sure you eat your celery!
translation.zh: -我去再接一杯 -一定要记得吃芹菜！

translation.en: -Oh, yes. -Yeah. She needs her fiber.
translation.zh: -好的 -对 她需要补充纤维素

translation.en: Oh, no, I don't need that. I have you right here.
translation.zh: 不 不用给我 我这里有你的资料

translation.en: -Lara Jean Covey. -Yeah.
translation.zh: -拉拉简科维 -对

translation.en: -That's me. -Welcome.
translation.zh: -就是我 -欢迎你

translation.en: -We're just waiting for one more. -Oh.
translation.zh: -我们还在等另一位志愿者 -是

translation.en: I thought that I was the only one who signed up.
translation.zh: 我还以为只有我报了名

translation.en: From Adler, yes, but we have a young man from Port Smith. His name is--
translation.zh: 没错 艾德勒高中只有你 但还有一个 来自史密斯港的年轻人 他叫…

translation.en: John Ambrose McClaren.
translation.zh: 约翰安布罗斯麦克拉伦

translation.en: Hi, Lara Jean.
translation.zh: 你好 拉拉简

translation.en: Hi-- [screams]
translation.zh: 你好…

translation.en: Oh, jeez! Lara Jean!
translation.zh: 老天！拉拉简！

translation.en: I'll get the first aid kit.
translation.zh: 我去拿急救箱

translation.en: Are you okay?
translation.zh: 你没事吧？

translation.en: Yeah.
translation.zh: 没事

translation.en: Follow my finger.
translation.zh: 眼睛跟着我的手指动

translation.en: -Oh. -Yeah.
translation.zh: -好 -好

translation.en: What are you doing?
translation.zh: 你在做什么？

translation.en: I'm making sure you're not concussed.
translation.zh: 确保你没得脑震荡

translation.en: How can you tell?
translation.zh: 你怎么能知道？

translation.en: [chuckles] I'm gonna ask you some questions.
translation.zh: 我要问你一些问题

translation.en: Okay.
translation.zh: 好

translation.en: You know who I am?
translation.zh: 你知道我是谁吗？

translation.en: Someone I sent a love letter to.
translation.zh: 一个曾经收到过我情书的人

translation.en: Yeah, that's the one.
translation.zh: 对 回答正确

translation.en: And, I'm gonna need that letter back.
translation.zh: 对了 你得把那封情书还给我

translation.en: Why?
translation.zh: 为什么？

translation.en: Oh, you know, I just-- I wrote it a long time ago,
translation.zh: 你懂的 我就是… 那是我很久之前写的了

translation.en: and I don't necessarily remember what I said, so,
translation.zh: 我并不记得自己都写了什么 所以

translation.en: I guess I just wanna know how mortified I should be.
translation.zh: 我猜我只是想知道自己该有多羞愧

translation.en: Okay, okay. I will... I'll bring you the letter on one condition.
translation.zh: 好吧 我会还给你 若你答应我一个条件 我就把信带来

translation.en: Okay, you have to return it after you read it.
translation.zh: 好的 就是你看完后得再还给我

translation.en: I just, I need proof that someone actually liked me in middle school.
translation.zh: 我需要证据证明自己上初中时 真的被人喜欢过

translation.en: Are you kidding?
translation.zh: 你在开玩笑吗？

translation.en: Everyone liked you in middle school.
translation.zh: 上初中时所有人都喜欢你

translation.en: Uh, I don't... I don't really think that's true.
translation.zh: 我觉得未必如此

translation.en: You know? But even if it was, I--
translation.zh: 其实 就算是真的 我…

translation.en: I didn't really care about everyone.
translation.zh: 我可不会在意所有人

translation.en: [Dorothy] Okay.
translation.zh: 好了

translation.en: How's the patient?
translation.zh: 病人怎么样了？

translation.en: Uh, she's... she's good. She's embarrassed, but okay.
translation.zh: 她没事 就是有点难为情 但没事

translation.en: [exhales] Good. Don't want to get sued again.
translation.zh: 很好 我可不想再被起诉

translation.en: You ready to get started?
translation.zh: 你们可以开始了吗？

translation.en: Come on. We got it. Nice and easy.
translation.zh: 来吧 我扶着你 慢慢站起来

translation.en: Good. Nice and slow.
translation.zh: 好的 慢慢站起来

translation.en: -Okay. -[Lara Jean groans]
translation.zh: 好的

translation.en: I bring it to you, you bring it back to me.
translation.zh: 我把信给你带来 但你得再还给我

translation.en: Those are my terms. Take 'em or leave 'em.
translation.zh: 这就是我的条件 要么答应 要么拉倒

translation.en: -Deal. -Okay.
translation.zh: -成交 -好

translation.en: -Ready. -Ready.
translation.zh: -准备好了 -准备好了

translation.en: [Lara Jean] I thought having a boyfriend
translation.zh: 我还以为有了男朋友

translation.en: meant the mere idea of other boys left your mind completely.
translation.zh: 就意味着自己再也不会想着其他男孩

translation.en: And yet, here I was, totally crazy about Peter, but...
translation.zh: 但我现在虽然爱彼得爱得疯狂 但是…

translation.en: I couldn't stop replaying my conversation with John Ambrose in my head.
translation.zh: 我还是忍不住在脑海里一遍遍回放 我和约翰安布罗斯的对话

translation.en: I didn't care about everyone.
translation.zh: 我可不会在意所有人

translation.en: [Lara Jean] I didn't want to be thinking about what might have been
translation.zh: 我不希望自己去想 如果他在初中时收到那封信

translation.en: if he'd gotten that letter in middle school instead of now.
translation.zh: 而不是现在 结果会怎样

translation.en: But I was.
translation.zh: 但我忍不住不去想

translation.en: So, I have a question.
translation.zh: 所以 我有个问题

translation.en: When you wrote those letters...
translation.zh: 你写那些信时…

translation.en: who'd you like the most?
translation.zh: 最喜欢其中哪个人？

translation.en: You had to have had a favorite.
translation.zh: 肯定有个人是你最喜欢的

translation.en: You couldn't have liked us all the same.
translation.zh: 你不可能同样喜欢我们几个

translation.en: One of the letters had to have been a little more intense than the others.
translation.zh: 某封信里蕴含的感情 一定比其他信里更强烈

translation.en: [Lara Jean] If I was really being honest,
translation.zh: 如果真要我说实话

translation.en: there was one letter that I remember
translation.zh: 我记得确实有封信

translation.en: being a little more intense than the others.
translation.zh: 其中蕴含的情感 要比其他几封强烈一些

translation.en: It was mine. Right?
translation.zh: 是写给我的那封 对吧？

translation.en: [John Ambrose] It was me.
translation.zh: 是写给我的那封

translation.en: Right?
translation.zh: 对吗？

translation.en: Are you sure you don't wanna add some glitter? Or maybe some pearls?
translation.zh: 你确定不想加点闪光粉？或者珍珠？

translation.en: I don't wanna go nuts, I mean this is our first Valentine's Day, so...
translation.zh: 我不想太过 毕竟这是我们第一个情人节 所以…

translation.en: [sighs] That's true.
translation.zh: 没错

translation.en: You don't wanna give him something super sweet and heartfelt
translation.zh: 你不想送他一样超级甜蜜 超级感人的礼物

translation.en: and have him give you something from Rite Aid.
translation.zh: 然后让他送你一件 得去来德爱药店买的东西

translation.en: Hmm. That would be embarrassing.
translation.zh: 那就太尴尬了

translation.en: You know, that's not gonna get to Margot in time.
translation.zh: 你的贺卡不会及时被送到玛戈特那里

translation.en: Well, good thing this one only has to make it across the street.
translation.zh: 好在这张贺卡只需被送去街对面就行

translation.en: Aw. You're giving Trina a valentine?
translation.zh: 你要给特瑞娜送情人节贺卡？

translation.en: Well, not from me. From Dad.
translation.zh: 不是我送 是爸爸送的

translation.en: Did you already forget our conversation about meddling?
translation.zh: 你忘了那天我们关于 别管闲事的对话了吗？

translation.en: Besides, Dad's not a glitter type of guy.
translation.zh: 而且 爸爸也不是 那种喜欢闪光粉的人

translation.en: Nor were you a Peter Kavinsky kinda girl till I sprinkled some glitter on it.
translation.zh: 在我帮你助力之前 凯文斯基也不喜欢你这种女生的

translation.en: Oh, uh-huh, mmm, walk away. Go get your turnovers!
translation.zh: 快走开吧！ 去把你的水果馅饼拿出来！

translation.en: I mean, as one of my success stories,
translation.zh: 作为我成功撮合成的恋人

translation.en: you'd think you'd be a tad more supportive.
translation.zh: 我还以为你会支持一下我呢

translation.en: Get ready, Lara Jean. Last year, Peter sent one to Gen every period.
translation.zh: 做好准备 拉拉简 去年吉每次来例假 彼得都派人去给她唱歌

translation.en: All right. Let's get this over with.
translation.zh: 好了 你们速战速决吧

translation.en: Oh, my God.
translation.zh: 我的天

translation.en: I'm fired up!
translation.zh: 我现在激情满满！

translation.en: -Whoa! -[Trevor laughs]
translation.zh: 天啊！

translation.en: Dude, you got spammed!
translation.zh: 伙计 这么多垃圾信件！

translation.en: Oh, my God. I don't even know who half of these people are.
translation.zh: 我的天 写信的人 半数我都不认识

translation.en: Uh, it's the girls' soccer team.
translation.zh: 这封好像来自女子足球队

translation.en: Is it Kelly? Yeah, she's nice to me. I like her.
translation.zh: 是凯莉吗？ 是 她对我挺好的 我喜欢她

translation.en: Hey.
translation.zh: 嗨

translation.en: Don't lose sleep over the Kavinsky fan club.
translation.zh: 千万别为凯文斯基的粉丝团烦心

translation.en: Okay, you're the one that dethroned Gen without even trying.
translation.zh: 好的 毕竟你不费吹灰之力 就把吉从他身边赶走了

translation.en: I guess. Just sometimes I wish my boyfriend was a little bit...
translation.zh: 大概是吧 但有时候 我真希望自己的男朋友…

translation.en: more anonymous.
translation.zh: 没那么出名

translation.en: Well, heavy is the head that wears the crown.
translation.zh: 欲戴皇冠 必承其重

translation.en: I don't want it. Take it back.
translation.zh: 我才不想要什么皇冠 还给你

translation.en: Oh, no, no, no. This is all you now.
translation.zh: 不行 皇冠是你的了

translation.en: -But I didn't ask for it. -Nah, this is all you. It's tough.
translation.zh: -可我根本不想要 -不 皇冠就是你的 不行

translation.en: -Stop. Gross. -It's yours now.
translation.zh: -行了 好恶心 -皇冠就是你的

translation.en: [Lucas] Well, tough. Look, I was thinking, all right..
translation.zh: 坚强女孩 听着 我在想 好吧…

translation.en: [Peter] Found you.
translation.zh: 终于找到你了

translation.en: You found me.
translation.zh: 你找到我了

translation.en: I was looking for my valentine.
translation.zh: 我在四处找我的情人

translation.en: Come on.
translation.zh: 跟我走

translation.en: Where are we going?
translation.zh: 我们去哪？

translation.en: You'll see.
translation.zh: 到时你就知道了

translation.en: So, I figured this is the perfect place to give you this
translation.zh: 我觉得这里是送你礼物的完美之地

translation.en: because this is where it all started when you jumped me.
translation.zh: 因为你就是在这里把我扑倒 然后一切就开始了

translation.en: Okay.
translation.zh: 好吧

translation.en: [sighing] It's beautiful.
translation.zh: 好美

translation.en: Um, would you put it on me?
translation.zh: 你能帮我戴上吗？

translation.en: Yeah.
translation.zh: 好啊

translation.en: Okay, um...
translation.zh: 好的 对了

translation.en: Stop.
translation.zh: 不是吧

translation.en: Oh, and, uh, here is your card.
translation.zh: 这是送你的情人节卡片

translation.en: I love it.
translation.zh: 我好喜欢

translation.en: One more thing.
translation.zh: 还有一件事

translation.en: Okay.
translation.zh: 好的

translation.en: "The moon never beams without bringing me dreams
translation.zh: “月亮总是发出淡淡的清辉 为我带来美梦

translation.en: of beautiful Lara Jean.
translation.zh: 关于美丽的拉拉简的美梦

translation.en: And stars never rise, but I feel the bright eyes
translation.zh: 星辰总是升起 让我感受到

translation.en: of beautiful Lara Jean."
translation.zh: 美丽的拉拉简的清澈的双眸”

translation.en: Do you like it?
translation.zh: 喜欢吗？

translation.en: Oh, my God. No one has ever written me a poem before.
translation.zh: 我的天 之前从未有人给我写过诗

translation.en: Like, seriously, this is the most romantic thing ever. I--
translation.zh: 真的 这是我经历的最浪漫的事 我…

translation.en: Hey, Chris? Why are we in woodshop for our Valentine's Subway tradition?
translation.zh: 克里斯？之前情人节我们都去赛百味 今年怎么换木材工坊了？

translation.en: Woodshop is the only place on campus I can stomach today.
translation.zh: 木材工坊是今天学校里 唯一让我能吃得下东西的地方

translation.en: -Mmm. -I get ear bleeds from a cappella.
translation.zh: 我听阿卡贝拉 耳朵都起茧子了

translation.en: Did Kavinsky sic them on you?
translation.zh: 凯文斯基有找人去给你唱吗？

translation.en: Ah, no, he got me something better.
translation.zh: 没有 他送了我更好的礼物

translation.en: Nice! Boy's got game.
translation.zh: 不错！这小子有两下子嘛

translation.en: And, I got you a little V-Day gift of my own.
translation.zh: 我也要用你一件情人节礼物

translation.en: -Oh, Chris, that's so sweet-- -It's advice.
translation.zh: -克里斯 真是太好… -是条建议

translation.en: Okay. [chuckles]
translation.zh: 好吧

translation.en: Before you go too far with Kavinsky,
translation.zh: 在你跟凯文斯基走到最后那步时

translation.en: make sure you are 100 percent--
translation.zh: 一定要确保你百分之百肯定…

translation.en: -No, 1000 percent sure-- -That it's something that I want. I know.
translation.zh: -不 是千分之一千肯定… -我想那么做 我知道

translation.en: -Trust me, I'm not-- -Actually, I was gonna say something else.
translation.zh: -相信我 我不是… -其实 我打算说别的事来着

translation.en: I am trying to make sure you know how to rev your own engine
translation.zh: 我想说的是在让任何人 上了你的本垒时

translation.en: before you let anyone under the hood.
translation.zh: 你一定要确保知道 如何调动起自己的“性”致

translation.en: Chris, we all know you can't wink. It's okay.
translation.zh: 克里斯 我们都知道 你不会眨一只眼 没事的

translation.en: I'm just saying! Make sure you know how to look after you!
translation.zh: 我就是说说！一定要确保 知道如何照顾好自己！

translation.en: Yeah, okay, I get it. I get it, thank you.
translation.zh: 好的 我明白 谢谢

translation.en: [Trevor] Hey.
translation.zh: 嗨

translation.en: Mm-hmm.
translation.zh: 好啊

translation.en: Are you sure there's no other reason why you wanted to eat in the woodshop today?
translation.zh: 你确定今天想在木材工坊吃东西 没有别的原因？

translation.en: We both like the smell of sawdust and that is not a crime.
translation.zh: 我们都喜欢锯末的味道 而且这又不是犯罪

translation.en: I'm gonna go.
translation.zh: 我要走了

translation.en: I think this is yours.
translation.zh: 这好像是给你准备的

translation.en: Thanks.
translation.zh: 谢了

translation.en: [mouthing] Oh, my God.
translation.zh: 我的天

translation.en: Shut up.
translation.zh: 闭嘴

translation.en: -Oh! John Ambrose, good to see you again! -Hi, Mrs. Glick.
translation.zh: -约翰安布罗斯 能再见到你真好 -你好 格里克夫人

translation.en: Oh, hi, John.
translation.zh: 你好 约翰

translation.en: Today's gonna be a fun day. I have an exciting project for you two.
translation.zh: 今天会很有意思的 我给你们俩 准备了一个很棒的活动

translation.en: Our annual Belleview garden party is coming up.
translation.zh: 我们就要举办一年一度的 贝尔维尤花园派对了

translation.en: Last year we got rained out, so we decided to move it indoors.
translation.zh: 去年派对时下起了雨 于是我们决定把场地搬到室内

translation.en: So we're gonna do the garden party in here?
translation.zh: 所以要在这里办花园派对？

translation.en: Yup! Put out some potted ferns, cheese platter.
translation.zh: 没错！摆一些蕨类盆栽、芝士拼盘

translation.en: I dunno, some twinkle lights? It'll be fine.
translation.zh: 我也不确定 一些彩灯？不会很难

translation.en: But, I need you two to clear out this space.
translation.zh: 但我需要你们两个清理一下这个地方

translation.en: -It's become a bit of a junk room. -Wow.
translation.zh: -这房间里堆的都是些破烂 -天啊

translation.en: What is this?
translation.zh: 这是什么情况？

translation.en: Mr. Sawoski's failed green thumb attempt
translation.zh: 萨沃斯基先生想尝试做园艺 但失败了

translation.en: and belongings of residents who passed.
translation.zh: 还有那些已过世的老人的东西

translation.en: Alone. With no family members to claim them.
translation.zh: 孤寡老人 留下的东西没有家人来领

translation.en: Make two piles, okay? Trash and donations.
translation.zh: 把东西分成两堆 好吗？ 一堆垃圾 一堆捐出去

translation.en: When I heard "garden party," I imagined art deco elegance.
translation.zh: 听到花园派对时 我脑中想象的是 装饰艺术优雅风

translation.en: Not a couple potted plants and a cheese plate.
translation.zh: 可不是几盆蕨类盆栽和芝士拼盘

translation.en: Yeah. Yeah, it's kind of depressing.
translation.zh: 是啊 是有点让人沮丧

translation.en: Yeah.
translation.zh: 是啊

translation.en: Look at this.
translation.zh: 看看这个

translation.en: Oh. Old love letters from someone stationed in Italy.
translation.zh: 旧情书 是某人从意大利寄过来的

translation.en: He sent her his photo with a note on the back.
translation.zh: 他给她寄了他的照片 照片后面还写了话

translation.en: "My darling Linda..."
translation.zh: “亲爱的琳达…”

translation.en: Oh, this seems personal. I feel a little funny reading this.
translation.zh: 这是私人信件 就这样拆开看有点不太好

translation.en: [John Ambrose] Wanna read this instead?
translation.zh: 那不如看看这封？ （收信人：约翰安布罗斯麦克拉伦）

translation.en: Remember, it's only a loan.

translation.en: I don't remember that.

translation.en: Fine. But even with a mild stutter, you were still a hot commodity.

translation.en: At sleepovers, girls used to say, "Are you Team Peter or Team John?"

translation.en: Yeah, that's just the thing.

translation.en: Girls pretended to like me

translation.en: because I was friends with Peter.

translation.en: You remember the sixth grade graduation dance?

translation.en: I couldn't believe when Sabrina Fox asked me to go with her.

translation.en: Couldn't believe it.

translation.en: But then she tried to dance with Peter the whole night.

translation.en: Even during the slow songs, when I couldn't pretend

translation.en: like we were just dancing in a group.

translation.en: [woman] Hey!

translation.en: Call the numbers.

translation.en: [John Ambrose] I-25.
I can't wait to be at an age
translation.zh: 我等不及长到

translation.en: where I'm not expected to think that flip cup is fun.

translation.en: Yeah, I mean, why do you think we're both volunteering

translation.en: and hanging out with the senior citizens on a Saturday?

translation.en: Are we lame?

translation.en: We might be a little bit. I-30.

translation.en: But, lame in a cool way.

translation.en: Totally lame in a cool way.

translation.en: -Yeah. -Are you kidding?
translation.zh: -对 -你在开玩笑吗？

translation.en: [chuckles] B-2?
Whoo! I got BINGO.

translation.en: Suck it. [laughs]

translation.en: Oh, cool.

translation.en: I mean like, okay, at parties and stuff, he would always

translation.en: peanut butter chocolate cupcakes, remember those?

translation.en: -Mm-hmm. -So good.

translation.en: And he took the last one of those, too.

translation.en: Right. And on that note,

translation.en: Hey.

translation.en: I think we should give the people what they want.

translation.en: Yeah?

translation.en: I think we should bring back the Star Ball.

translation.en: I think it's crazy that people think all old people wanna do is play bingo.

translation.en: There's something I need to tell you.

translation.en: Yeah, um, that's a great idea.

translation.en: And we can invite the other people that were there when we buried it.

translation.en: Yeah.

translation.en: What makes the octopus's pulmonary system unique

translation.en: that piece of string was the most valuable thing in your life.

translation.en: -and wore this hat every single day. -Oh, my God.

translation.en: genius now.
translation.zh: 现在也还是

translation.en: I don't know about that. I think a genius would know the time value of money.
translation.zh: 这可说不准 我觉得天才 肯定会知道金钱的时间价值

translation.en: You know how like a 20 dollar bill now is actually worth less
translation.zh: 六年前的20美元

translation.en: than it was six years ago.
translation.zh: 现在肯定贬值了

translation.en: -You really got me. -I know.
translation.zh: -的确有道理 -我知道 多谢

translation.en: Mm-hmm. You're the last one left. What's inside?
translation.zh: -的确有道理 -我知道 多谢 你是最后一个 里面还有什么？

translation.en: Um, well, it's empty.
translation.zh: 是空的

translation.en: Impossible. You put something in there. We all did.
translation.zh: 不可能 你肯定往里面放了东西 我们都放了

translation.en: Well, I don't really know what to tell you because there's nothing in there.
translation.zh: 我不知道该怎么跟你们说 但里面就是空的

translation.en: Uh, does anyone want the last slice?
translation.zh: 谁要吃最后一块披萨吗？

translation.en: Too slow.
translation.zh: 你问得太迟了

translation.en: -What? -It's getting too crowded in here.
translation.zh: -怎么了？ -这里太挤了

translation.en: -[Trevor] Same. -Yeah, I'm out.
translation.zh: 对 我要走了

translation.en: I can stick around and help you clean up if you want.
translation.zh: 我可以留下来跟你一起清理

translation.en: -I got it. -[John Ambrose] Oh, dude,
translation.zh: -我可以帮她 -伙计

translation.en: it's cool. I mean, I kinda helped make the mess. But it's fine, I don't mind--
translation.zh: 没事的 这些垃圾算是我制造的 但没关系 我不介意…

translation.en: No, man. I think I can handle helping my girlfriend clean up.
translation.zh: 不用 伙计 我觉得我可以 帮我女朋友清理这里

translation.en: Thank you, though.
translation.zh: 但还是谢谢你了

translation.en: I'll go down. You wanna hand me stuff?
translation.zh: 那我下去了 你能递给我东西吗？

translation.en: Okay.
translation.zh: 好

translation.en: I'll see you tomorrow.
translation.zh: 那我们明天见

translation.en: Sure.
translation.zh: 没问题

translation.en: Why didn't you tell McClaren that you and I are together?
translation.zh: 你为何没告诉麦克拉伦我们是恋人？

translation.en: Well, I wanted to. I tried to. There just was never a good time.
translation.zh: 我想跟他说来着 我试过 但就是没有合适的机会

translation.en: Yeah, there's usually not, when you're flirting.
translation.zh: 是啊 调情的时候 怎么会有合适的机会

translation.en: Well, we weren't flirting. So...
translation.zh: 我们没有调情 所以…

translation.en: Well, next time you need pizza, just ask me. I'll get it for you.
translation.zh: 下次你要是需要披萨 直接跟我说 我会带过来

translation.en: What is it with you and pizza?
translation.zh: 你对披萨有什么意见？

translation.en: It's not about pizza.
translation.zh: 我对披萨没意见

translation.en: If he brings the pizza then it looks like you two threw the party.
translation.zh: 如果他带披萨来 就会让人觉得派对是你俩举办的

translation.en: It sort of was.
translation.zh: 本来就是

translation.en: You can't do that, Lara Jean.
translation.zh: 你不能那么做 拉拉简

translation.en: Not when you have a boyfriend. Doesn't look right.
translation.zh: 尤其在你有男朋友的时候 那样不对

translation.en: Oh, right.
translation.zh: 好吧

translation.en: So, like, inviting your ex-girlfriend to your current girlfriend's party.
translation.zh: 所以邀请前女友参加现女友的派对 就可以了？

translation.en: I did not invite her! Like, officially. I...
translation.zh: 我没有邀请她！没有正式邀请过

translation.en: -I might've mentioned it. -Oh, yeah? When?
translation.zh: -我或许提了一嘴 -是吗？什么时候？

translation.en: I don't know.
translation.zh: 我不知道

translation.en: Why does it matter? You're the one who arranged the pizza.
translation.zh: 这重要吗？是你安排了让他带披萨来

translation.en: -Okay, we're going around in circles. -Well, it's not supposed to be like this.
translation.zh: -好吧 我们陷入死循环了 -事情本不该这样的

translation.en: -Then, how's it supposed to be? -I don't know. Not like this though.
translation.zh: -那应该是怎样的？ -我不知道 反正不是这样

translation.en: Does that mean you wanna break up?
translation.zh: 你是想跟我分手吗？

translation.en: Wait, what? No! Why would you say that?
translation.zh: 等一下 什么？ 不是的 你为何那么说？

translation.en: I don't know.
translation.zh: 我不知道

translation.en: Is that why you didn't tell John about us? So you'd keep your options open?
translation.zh: 这是你没跟约翰说 我们的事的原因吗？你想接着挑人？

translation.en: No! That's not the reason at all.
translation.zh: 不 根本不是那个原因

translation.en: Okay, fine! Ever since we started dating for real, I don't know how to act.
translation.zh: 好吧！自从我们真正开始约会 我就不知道该怎么办

translation.en: I didn't read the girlfriend's handbook.
translation.zh: 我又没读《女友指南》

translation.en: Girlfriend's handbook? Uh... what does that mean?
translation.zh: 《女友指南》？这话什么意思？

translation.en: Like, little stuff. Like I remember Gen used to dress up for your games.
translation.zh: 就是一些小事 我记得吉 经常在你比赛的时候盛装打扮

translation.en: -Am I supposed to do that? -It's not just Gen.
translation.zh: -我也该那么做吗？ -不仅仅是吉那么做

translation.en: Okay, all the girlfriends do that.
translation.zh: 好吧 所有的女朋友都会那么做

translation.en: Okay, so, do you want me to?
translation.zh: 好吧 那你希望我那么做吗？

translation.en: I mean, no, not if you don't want to.
translation.zh: 不啊 你要是不愿意就不用

translation.en: It would be nice, it would show that you care.
translation.zh: 虽然你那么做比较贴心 这表示你在乎我

translation.en: Oh, like sending a serenade to someone on Valentine's Day, maybe?
translation.zh: 或许就像在情人节那天 派人去给某人唱小夜曲？

translation.en: I... I didn't think that was your style. I mean... [sighs]
translation.zh: 我没想到你会喜欢那个

translation.en: Well, it's not my style.
translation.zh: 我确实不喜欢

translation.en: Okay, so...
translation.zh: 好吧 那…

translation.en: Let's never fight again, okay?
translation.zh: 我们别再吵架了 好吗？

translation.en: [softly] Okay.
translation.zh: 好

translation.en: I got this.
translation.zh: 我来吧

translation.en: This way.
translation.zh: 这边

translation.en: You have quite the ability to remain sneakily silent.
translation.zh: 你很擅长做什么事都不搞出大动静

translation.en: I know I should've told you about me and Peter.
translation.zh: 我知道我该早点告诉你 我跟彼得的事的

translation.en: It's okay.
translation.zh: 没关系

translation.en: Lara Jean, I...
translation.zh: 拉拉简 我…

translation.en: I was just embarrassed.
translation.zh: 我当时真是难为情

translation.en: 'Cause I... I read it all wrong.
translation.zh: 因为我完全会错意了

translation.en: It's totally my fault.
translation.zh: 这都是我的错

translation.en: I'm sorry.
translation.zh: 对不起

translation.en: Since we're, um... Since we're coming clean
translation.zh: 既然我们在向彼此

translation.en: about stuff...
translation.zh: 坦白一些事

translation.en: You know how you call me John Ambrose?
translation.zh: 你知道你一直叫我 约翰安布罗斯吗？

translation.en: Everyone calls you that.
translation.zh: 大家都那么叫你

translation.en: I know.
translation.zh: 我知道

translation.en: It's because of you.
translation.zh: 都是因为你

translation.en: What?
translation.zh: 什么？

translation.en: Before sixth grade, pretty much everybody called me John.
translation.zh: 六年级之前 几乎所有人都叫我约翰

translation.en: And then I met you, and you called me John Ambrose
translation.zh: 然后我认识了你 你叫我约翰安布罗斯

translation.en: and said how it was cool that we both went by our first and middle names.
translation.zh: 说我们两个都让别人叫我们的 名字和中间名是很酷的事

translation.en: I didn't wanna correct you,
translation.zh: 我不想纠正你 而且

translation.en: I liked how we had something in common.
translation.zh: 我喜欢我们有共同点

translation.en: So I started telling people to call me John Ambrose.
translation.zh: 所以我开始告诉别人 让他们叫我约翰安布罗斯

translation.en: Wow.
translation.zh: 天啊

translation.en: I don't know what to say.
translation.zh: 我都不知道该说什么好

translation.en: Are we good, John...
translation.zh: 我们还好吗 约翰…

translation.en: Ambrose?
translation.zh: 安布罗斯？

translation.en: We've always been good.
translation.zh: 我们一直都很好

translation.en: Lara...
translation.zh: 拉拉…

translation.en: Jean.
translation.zh: 简

translation.en: [Lara Jean] Are we doing Brussels sprouts this year?
translation.zh: （假恩节） 今年还做抱子甘蓝吗？

translation.en: Ah, nobody really ate them last year.
translation.zh: 去年根本就没人吃

translation.en: Kitty says Fakesgiving's all about the potatoes anyway.
translation.zh: 反正基蒂说假恩节的时候 我们基本都是在吃土豆

translation.en: Okay. Then, I think we're good.
translation.zh: 好吧 那我们就都买齐了

translation.en: On second thought, I'll get us some Brussels.
translation.zh: 但我想了想 还是买点抱子甘蓝吧

translation.en: -Hi. -What you doing?
translation.zh: -嗨 -你打算做什么菜？

translation.en: [Trina] You know, just...
translation.zh: 你懂的 就是…

translation.en: making a soup.
translation.zh: -做… -让我看看

translation.en: -Ah, these are good. -Yes, yeah, those are... those...
translation.zh: -这些食材不错 -对 它们都很美味

translation.en: [Lara Jean] I'd never seen my dad with a crush.
translation.zh: 我从未见过爸爸暗恋一个人

translation.en: But, there he was,
translation.zh: 但他站在那里

translation.en: laughing nervously with his hands in his pockets.
translation.zh: 双手放在兜里 紧张地笑着

translation.en: He looks a little... hopeless.
translation.zh: 他看起来有点…无助

translation.en: -Hi. -Hi.
translation.zh: -嗨 -嗨

translation.en: I was supposed to get some Brussels sprouts but I got distracted...
translation.zh: 我本来要拿点抱子甘蓝 但分了心…

translation.en: -uh... for our... -Ah. I see.
translation.zh: 我本来要拿点抱子甘蓝 但分了心… -我明白了 -为我们的…

translation.en: -Fakesgiving. -Fakesgiving.
translation.zh: -假恩节 -假恩节

translation.en: It's like regular Thanksgiving, but it's in March, it's a family tradition.
translation.zh: 跟普通的感恩节一样 但是在三月举行 这算是家庭传统

translation.en: Oh, my God, that's so fun.
translation.zh: 我的天 听起来很好玩

translation.en: You should come.
translation.zh: 你应该过来

translation.en: [Dan] Yeah.
translation.zh: 对

translation.en: Oh, well, I-I don't wanna...
translation.zh: 那个 我可不想…

translation.en: You don't wanna wait till November for turkey.
translation.zh: 你可不想等到11月才能吃到火鸡

translation.en: [Dan] Right? You wanna come?
translation.zh: 对吧？你要来吗？

translation.en: -Yeah, count me in. -Okay.
translation.zh: -好啊 算我一个 -好的

translation.en: I'll, uh, I'll text ya the deets.
translation.zh: 我随后会发给亲细节

translation.en: [giggling] Okay.
translation.zh: 好的

translation.en: -No one says that. -That's some nice lingo. [clears throat]
translation.zh: -现在没人这么说话了 -他这么说还挺逗的

translation.en: -I'm glad you're coming. -Me too.
translation.zh: -我很高兴你会来 -我也是

translation.en: But there's something that I should tell you.
translation.zh: 但有件事我得告诉你

translation.en: You know that valentine that Dad sent you?
translation.zh: 你知道爸爸送你的情人节卡片吧？

translation.en: Kitty made that.
translation.zh: 是基蒂做的

translation.en: Wait, so you're telling me that the valentine
translation.zh: 等一下 所以你是在告诉我

translation.en: that was addressed to Mrs. Rothschild in glitter glue...
translation.zh: 粘着闪光胶粉的那封 寄给罗斯柴尔德夫人的情人节卡片…

translation.en: ...wasn't from your Dad?
translation.zh: 不是你爸爸做的？

translation.en: Well, that is a plot twist.
translation.zh: 这可真是大反转啊

translation.en: Wait, did Dad get Brussels sprouts?
translation.zh: 等一下 我爸拿抱子甘蓝了吗？

translation.en: He did not get the Brussels sprouts.
translation.zh: 他没拿抱子甘蓝 好的

translation.en: [Lara Jean] Dad.
translation.zh: 爸爸

translation.en: [Dan] What?
translation.zh: 怎么了？

translation.en: -Get more. -Okay.
translation.zh: -再拿些 那些不够 -好

translation.en: -That's not enough. -Okay.
translation.zh: -再拿些 那些不够 -好 没问题

translation.en: [Trina] Mm-hmm.
translation.zh: -我喜欢这菜 -好吃

translation.en: [Dan] All right.
translation.zh: 好了

translation.en: Is something wrong with the green beans?
translation.zh: 青豆有什么问题吗？

translation.en: Uh, they're just a little un-Covey.
translation.zh: 有点不太像科维家的风格

translation.en: No? I mean everything else on the table looks like it could be
translation.zh: 不是吗？我是说桌子上的每道菜

translation.en: in one of my mom's food and wine magazines.
translation.zh: 都像是我妈的美食红酒杂志上的佳肴

translation.en: -He noticed. -[Dan] He's got a good eye.
translation.zh: -他注意到了 -他很有观察力

translation.en: It's silly, we do a little thing where I get a can of green beans.
translation.zh: 这件事很蠢 我会在这天买罐青豆

translation.en: No, it's symbolic. I mean, it's kind of, um, for Mom.
translation.zh: 不 这是有象征意义的 我是说 这算是为了纪念妈妈

translation.en: Okay, it sounds like there's a story there. Is there a story?
translation.zh: 好的 听起来这背后还有个故事 是有个故事吗？

translation.en: Oh, when I was in college, I got invited to a Thanksgiving party in a dorm room.
translation.zh: 我上大学时 有次被邀请 去一个宿舍参加感恩节派对

translation.en: But the weird thing is, it was the middle of March,
translation.zh: 但奇怪的事 当时是在三月中旬

translation.en: and the girl hosting it was the coolest girl I ever saw.
translation.zh: 派对的组织者是我见过的最酷的女孩

translation.en: Evie, their mom.
translation.zh: 就是她们的妈妈伊维

translation.en: And she thought it was unfair that the two best holidays of the year
translation.zh: 她认为每年最好的两个节日都在年底

translation.en: were at the end of the year, right on top of each other and
translation.zh: 一个接着另一个 这不公平 所以

translation.en: we should just spread the love a little bit
translation.zh: 我们应该把爱传播一下

translation.en: and have a potluck for good ol' March.
translation.zh: 在阳春三月举行百味餐

translation.en: Right, and at that potluck, when everyone made homemade goods,
translation.zh: 对 那次百味餐上 大家都带了自制的菜

translation.en: Dad brought
translation.zh: 但爸爸带了

translation.en: -canned green beans. -Canned green beans.
translation.zh: -一罐青豆 -一罐青豆

translation.en: -Right. -[all chuckling]
translation.zh: 对

translation.en: And she made fun of him the entire night.
translation.zh: 她嘲笑了他一整晚

translation.en: She made so much fun of me, I thought she was really mad at me.
translation.zh: 她不停地嘲笑我 我还以为她真的很生我的气

translation.en: But after, her roommate told you that that's just how she flirts, right?
translation.zh: 但后来 她室友告诉你 那就是她的调情方式 对吧？

translation.en: See, she teases you.
translation.zh: 瞧见没？她会捉弄你

translation.en: -Is that... -Nope.
translation.zh: 才不是

translation.en: All right, well that is a really sweet tradition.
translation.zh: 好吧 这真是一个很温馨的传统

translation.en: -Thanks for sharing that story. -Yeah, thanks.
translation.zh: -谢谢你们分享给我这个故事 -是啊 谢谢

translation.en: Oh, there's one other tradition.
translation.zh: 对了 还有一个传统

translation.en: Yes. Newcomers have to eat the beans.
translation.zh: 对 新来的人必须吃豆子

translation.en: -Oh, I don't think that's necessary. -Oh, it is very necessary.
translation.zh: -我觉得没这个必要 -非常有必要

translation.en: Mom made you eat them, and Margot made Josh, so...
translation.zh: 妈妈让你吃过 玛戈特让乔希吃过 所以…

translation.en: Oh, well then, yeah. [clears throat] That sounds pretty set in stone.
translation.zh: 那好吧 听起来这是板上钉钉的事了

translation.en: Okay.
translation.zh: 好的

translation.en: Bottoms up.
translation.zh: 一口气吃光

translation.en: I don't mind. I like canned goods.
translation.zh: 我不介意 我喜欢罐装食品

translation.en: -That makes so much sense. -[laughs]
translation.zh: 难怪啊

translation.en: To Eve.
translation.zh: 敬伊芙

translation.en: Evie.
translation.zh: 敬伊维

translation.en: Huh?
translation.zh: 怎么样？

translation.en: Nice?
translation.zh: 好吃吗？

translation.en: You know what? It's not terrible.
translation.zh: 其实 味道没那么糟糕

translation.en: -Right? -There you have it.
translation.zh: -是吗？ -我就说嘛

translation.en: -[Trina] That's what that is. -Can you pass the cranberry sauce?
translation.zh: -是吗？ -我就说嘛 能把蔓越莓酱递给我吗？

translation.en: I'll cut some turkey. Will you take this, hon?
translation.zh: 我来切火鸡 你能拿下这个吗 亲爱的？

translation.en: -Yeah, of course. -Okay.
translation.zh: -好 没问题 -好的

translation.en: [Dan] Okay, let's see here.
translation.zh: 好的 让我看看

translation.en: -You've done this before, right? -Dad, that's not totally necessary.
translation.zh: -爸爸 你完全没必要这么做！ -你之前就这么做过 对吧？

translation.en: [Lara Jean] I may have had a few missteps at this whole girlfriend thing.
translation.zh: 我或许在当女友的事上走错了几步

translation.en: But not today.
translation.zh: 但今天不会

translation.en: That last one hurt.
translation.zh: 最后那下最厉害

translation.en: LJ! Like your look. Pete's gonna love it!
translation.zh: 拉拉简！瞧你这身打扮 彼得一定会超喜欢！

translation.en: Dude, hey. Um...
translation.zh: 伙计

translation.en: What?
translation.zh: 怎么了？

translation.en: I don't know how to tell you this.
translation.zh: 我不知道该怎么跟你说

translation.en: Well, just say it.
translation.zh: 直说吧

translation.en: I just saw Peter and Gen together.
translation.zh: 我刚才看到彼得和吉在一起了

translation.en: They seemed close.
translation.zh: 他们看起来很亲密

translation.en: Close like, um, how close?
translation.zh: 有多亲密？

translation.en: Hi.
translation.zh: 嗨

translation.en: Were you with Gen today?
translation.zh: 你今天见过吉吗？

translation.en: Uh, yeah. Yeah.
translation.zh: 对

translation.en: Here we go again.
translation.zh: 又开始了

translation.en: Listen, she was upset because there's some
translation.zh: 听着 她有点难过

translation.en: things happening with her mom and her dad
translation.zh: 因为她爸妈感情出了点问题

translation.en: and she just wanted to talk to someone who understands.
translation.zh: 她只想找能理解她的人倾诉一下

translation.en: -That's it. -That's it?
translation.zh: -就这样 -就这样？

translation.en: Kavinsky! Let's go!
translation.zh: 凯文斯基！快点！

translation.en: Peter, that is everything.
translation.zh: 彼得 这说明了一切

translation.en: She is trying to prove that no matter what is going on in your life,
translation.zh: 她在试图证明不论你在经历什么

translation.en: when she calls, you come running.
translation.zh: 你永远对她随叫随到

translation.en: And when push comes to shove, you pick her,
translation.zh: 等到了关键时刻 你会选她

translation.en: you pick her every single time.
translation.zh: 你每次都会选她

translation.en: That's bullshit.
translation.zh: 你别胡说了

translation.en: Okay? I pick you.
translation.zh: 好吗？我会选你

translation.en: Lara Jean, when there was an actual choice, I picked you.
translation.zh: 拉拉简 当初我面临真正的选择时 我选了你

translation.en: An actual choice? Like, what does that even mean?
translation.zh: 真正的选择？这话什么意思？

translation.en: She took that video, I told her that if she ever hurt you again then we were done.
translation.zh: 视频是她拍的 我告诉她如果她再敢 伤害你 我跟她就一刀两断

translation.en: -So you knew? -Yeah, Lara Jean--
translation.zh: -所以你早就知道？ -对 拉拉简…

translation.en: You denied it.
translation.zh: -可你之前说你不知道 -因为你们俩那时
